alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:01PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 445 PM MST... At 401 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Seville, or near Gilbert, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Gilbert City Hall, Magma, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley, Seville, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, San Tan Mountain Park, Gold Camp, Santan and Higley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 near mile marker 203. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 153 and 158. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 34 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
